reviews.review: I love it! It's a classic that never gets old; always something new to see
Totally love the game. Shoot portal jump through. Brilliant voice performances. 10/10
I love this game! The characters are awesome, and the story is great, it's also super fun to play the multiplayer with friends!

I played this game over 10 years ago. It's still a unique experience to this day. The world needs more from the Portal franchise. 

Co-Op in Portal 2 is essentially a completely separate campaign and it's loads of fun.
God tier game, even 11 years later. Need I say more?
This game is so good for: community test chambers.And with developer console you can break Portal 2.
The portal walls are made of cum

Like, it makes sense that the game is called Portal 2, cause there are two portals. But what about the first game? That has two portals too and is only called Portal. Really inconsistent, Valve.
